description: Building the Agent Facilitator app to generate autonomous AI bundles for Claude 4.5 and beyond, without using AMP.

userStories.title: Define Domain Models for LLM Providers
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to define types for different LLM providers (Claude, GPT, etc.) and their specific CLI commands to facilitate non-AMP script generation.
acceptanceCriteria: Create 'LlmProvider' enum with 'CLAUDE_4_5', 'GPT_4O', etc.
Define 'LlmConfig' type mapping providers to their execution command (e.g., 'anthropic' for Claude)
Update 'ProjectConfig' to include these types
npm run typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Created src/types/llm.ts with LlmProvider enum, LlmConfig type with CLI commands, and ProjectConfig interface

userStories.title: Implement PRD-to-JSON Logic
userStories.description: As a user, I want my text description converted into the structured 'prd.json' format required by Ralph.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement utility to map text description to the Ralph JSON schema
Output prd.json matches SKILL.md schema: project, branchName (prefixed ralph/...), userStories array
Each story includes id, title, description, acceptanceCriteria, priority, passes=false, notes=""
Acceptance criteria include "npm run typecheck passes" (and "npm test passes" where relevant); UI stories include "Verify in browser using dev-browser skill"
Stories are right-sized and ordered by dependency
npm test passes
userStories.notes: Created src/lib/prd-generator.ts with generatePrd, validatePrd, and serializePrd functions

userStories.title: Generate Non-AMP Ralph Script Template
userStories.description: As a user, I want a 'ralph.sh' that uses my chosen LLM (e.g. Claude 4.5) via its native CLI instead of AMP.
acceptanceCriteria: Template for 'ralph.sh' matches canonical logic from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/snarktank/ralph/main/ralph.sh (archive, .last-branch, progress reset, <promise>COMPLETE</promise> detection)
LLM invocation uses a provider-selected command (e.g., anthropic CLI) instead of amp
Preserve SCRIPT_DIR-based path resolution so the script runs from any cwd
The generated script correctly pipes prompt.md to the selected LLM's CLI/API
npm run typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Created src/lib/ralph-generator.ts with generateRalphScript, generatePromptMd, and generateBundle functions

userStories.title: Build Industrial Intake UI with Model Selection
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select 'Claude Opus 4.5' from a high-end UI and input my project details.
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown includes 'Claude Opus 4.5' as a primary option
UI matches 'Warm Industrial Gray' style with Playfair Display typography
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Created AgentFacilitator component with model dropdown, project inputs, feature list, and live preview

userStories.title: Implement ZIP Bundle Export
userStories.description: As a user, I want to download my generated Ralph bundle as a ZIP file.
acceptanceCriteria: Files are placed in 'scripts/ralph/' and 'tasks/' folders within the ZIP
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Created zip-export.ts with JSZip, downloads ralph-bundle-{project}.zip with correct folder structure
